content: on r needle make a third loop ssk three times * k2tog three times yo into same st leave on r needle k1 five times yo ssk three times* repeat from * to * until 11st remain k2tog three times yo k1 two times yo lace row 17 lace flower row k2 kyok k7 kyok k2 *lace flower k3* repeat from * to * until 10st remain k7 kyok k2 lace row 12 repeat lace row 4 lace row 13-16 repeat lace row 1 & 4 twice 279sts page 4 #maeflowershawl @figleaf_fiber mae flower shawl lace row 18 k3 yo k12 * p2togtbl k1 bindoff jeny s very stretchy bindoff repeat one time p2togtbl k2* repeat this bindoff uses a reverse yo to do a from * to * until 9st remain k6 yo k3 reverse yo pass the yarn over the needle lace row 19-20 repeat lace row 1 & 4 from back to front rather than front to back once 291sts like in a normal yo lace row 21 repeat lace row 1 bindoff instructions lace row 22 repeat lace row 2 reverse yo on r needle k1 pass yo over st now you have 1 st on r needle reverse lace row 23 k2 kyok k10 * k2tog three yo k1 pass yo over st now 2 st on r times yo k1 five times yo ssk three needle pass r st over l st now you will times* repeat from * to * until 12st remain have 1 st on r needle again repeat until all k2tog three times yo k1 three times sts have been bound off kyok k2 break yarn weave in ends block to lace row 24 repeat lace row 4 measurements lace row 25 repeat lace row 1 lace row 26 repeat lace row 2 lace row 27 k2 kyok k5 yo k1 five times yo ssk three times * k2tog three times yo k1 five times yo ssk three times* repeat from * to * until 18st remain k2tog three times k9 kyok k2 lace row 28 repeat lace row 4 lace row 29 repeat lace row 1 lace row 30 repeat lace row 2 lace row 31 k2 kyok k2 ssk three times * k2tog three times yo k1 five times yo ssk three times* repeat from * to * until 4st remain k1 kyok k2 325sts page 5 #maeflowershawl @figleaf_fiber mae flower shawl thank you so much for making one of my patterns it really means the world to me you can email me for pattern support at figleaffiber@gmail com if you have any questions i would love to see your progress and finished objects tag @figleaf_fiber and/or #maeflowershawl on instagram if ravelry is accessible to you making a ravelry project page is great too page 6 #maeflowershawl @figleaf_fiber
